pr_title: MINOR: Fix a number of warnings in mirror/mirror-client

timeline.bodyText: We are calling close even though it doesn't do anything just to avoid warnings? Where are the warnings coming from?
timeline.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText: I had "resource never closed" warnings in Eclipse. Are we interested in fixing those? If no, I'll remove that change.
replies.author: mimaison

replies.bodyText: I'd favor focusing on warnings that the build can generate and enforce.
replies.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText: Ok, I've removed these changes. Thanks
replies.author: mimaison

timeline.message: MINOR: Fix a number of warnings in mirror/mirror-client
MINOR: Fix a number of warnings in mirror/mirror-client
